title: Inter IIT Tech Meet
text:
Inter IIT Tech Meet is the annual technological competition organized by the Indian Institutes of Technology and qualifies as the only technical event wherein all the IITs participate. This event is hosted in cycle by one of the participating institutions. At end of each Tech Meet the next host IIT is chosen by mutual consensus.
Tech Meet tries involves students to work on real life problems and pertaining to local issues and areas which require attention but are not extensively address through different platforms. Also it has elements pertaining to knowledge sharing and promoting collaboration among IITs.
Inter IIT Tech Meet comprises of ardent competitions, exhibitions, illuminating talks and exhilarating pro-nights that inspire, enthrall and mesmerize the massive hordes that attend. According to the pan-IIT Tech Board, “The Inter IIT Tech Meet is a consequence of students of various IITs coming together envisioning a progressive India. We realise that there are countless problems which our country faces due to its population, geographic expanse, climate, infrastructure etc. A lot of efforts are being put by various educational institutes for coming up with technology solutions which could address these issues. Numerous government policies and initiatives have created opportunities for promoting and encouraging the development of technology to address the issues. We feel that that IITs being premier education and research institutes must spearhead these initiatives. Enhanced collaboration between IITs would foster development of technology solutions and also encourage more and more graduating students to pursue this into full time ventures wherein they take this technology from research labs to end users, impacting a million lives.” [ 1 ]

title: [ 2 ] 3rd Inter IIT Tech Meet
text:
It was held at IIT Kharagpur from January 30th to February 1st, 2015. Results of the events:
Event | Gold | Silver | Bronze
Case Study | IIT Kharagpur | IIT Ropar | IIT Hyderabad
Data Analytics | IIT Kharagpur and IIT Mandi (joint) | - | IIT Kanpur
Product Design | IIT Kanpur | IIT Kharagpur | IIT Bombay
Businness and Technology Quiz | IIT Kharagpur | IIT Mandi and IIT Guwahati (joint) | -
Open Soft | IIT Kharagpur | IIT Hyderabad | IIT Kanpur
Hardware Modelling | IIT Kharagpur | IIT Mandi | IIT Madras
Messier Marathon | IIT Kanpur | IIT Kharagpur | IIT Guwahati
Model Village | IIT Bombay | IIT Guwahati | IIT Kanpur and IIT Hyderabad (joint)
Total points tally:
• IIT Kharagpur - 515 points
• IIT Kanpur - 265 points
• IIT Mandi - 157.5 points
Furthermore:
• The Application Cup was won by IIT Kharagpur with 235 points.
• The Innovation Cup was won by IIT Kharagpur with 160 points.
• The Knowledge Cup was won by IIT Kharagpur with 120 points.

title: 6th Inter IIT Tech Meet [ 3 ]
text:
Sixth edition of Tech Meet was held at IIT Madras from 5th to 7th January, 2018. 6th Tech Meet introduced some profound changes with lot of industrial level problems being inducted into Tech Meet with senior engineers/scientists interacting with students and providing with practical problems relevant to the industry. The sixth edition gained significant media attraction compared to previous editions.
Overall Standings [ 4 ]
• IIT Kharagpur
• IIT Roorkee
• IIT Madras

title: 7th Inter IIT Tech Meet [ 5 ]
text:
Seventh edition was being hosted at IIT Bombay from 18th to 20th December, 2018. First tech board meet with representatives from 17 IITs were held for first time for discussing upon the first formal draft of Tech Meet Constitution during 25-26th August, 2018, with primary agenda to shape Tech meet into student driven platform for collaboration and exchange of knowledge at student level. Also, structural changes to how teams are evaluated as part of techmeet was changed compared to previous meet with teams coming up in the same bandwidth of performance (compared absolute marks) being awarded the same medal. The tradition of including industrial partners to give realistic problem was continued with Reliance Jio, BARC India, Drona Aviation etc as partners. At the same time challenges which allowed institutes to focus on local level campus sustainability challenges and Agricultural challenge problems relevant to regions where individual IITs belonged were included in techmeet which was supported by Tata Centre, IIT Bombay. Several other academic centres also floated problems. Engineer's Conclave which included can be considered was poster presentation event of student projects from 19 IITs was an event that was scaled up 6th edition and was an attractive part of overall event which was non-competitive. Also, Student Academic Conference(SAC) for undergraduate students was launched in 7th edition. Dr Anjali Parasnis, Associate Director, Nutritional Security at TERI was the chief guest for 7th Inter IIT Tech Meet. This was the first Inter IIT Tech meet with all 23 IITs participating.
Competitive Events | Gold | Silver | Bronze
Campus Sustainability Challenge | IIT Roorkee | IIT BHU, IIT Madras | IIT Bombay, IIT Kharagpur, IIT Tirupati, IIT Jodhpur
TCTD Challenge (Agricultural Challenge) | IIT Palakkad, IIT Roorkee | IIT BHU, IIT Kanpur | IIT Bombay, IIT Guwahati
Star Cluster Identifier | IIT Bombay | IIT Kanpur | IIT BHU, IIT Guwahati
The Eye in the Sky | IIT Roorkee | IIT Bombay, IIT Kanpur | IIT Gandhinagar, IIT Bhubaneshwar
PlutoX Hackathon | IIT Tirupati | IIT Kanpur | IIT Bombay, IIT BHU, IIT Guwahati
BETiC Innovation Challenge (Biomedical) | IIT Kharagpur, IIT Madras, IIT Gandhinagar, IIT Guwahati,IIT Tirupati, IIT Jodhpur, IIT (ISM ) Dhanbad | IIT Bombay, IIT Roorkee, IIT (ISM) Dharwad, IIT Ropar, IIT Bhubaneshwar | IIT Kanpur, IIT BHU, IIT Indore
Case Study | IIT Kharagpur | IIT Bombay, IIT Roorkee
TV Audience Measurement Challenge | IIT Kharagpur | IIT Kanpur | IIT Bombay
Coding Hackathon | IIT Jammu, IIT Bombay | IIT BHU, IIT Madras, IIT Jodhpur

title: 8th Inter IIT Tech Meet
text: Eighth edition of Inter Tech Meet was held at IIT Roorkee from 20th to 22nd December, 2019.

title: 9th Inter IIT Tech Meet
text: Ninth edition of Inter Tech Meet was held at IIT Guwahati from 26th to 28th March, 2021.

title: 10th Inter IIT Tech Meet
text: Tenth edition of Inter Tech Meet was held at IIT Kharagpur from 25th to 27th March, 2022.

title: Website
text: Information about the various events can be found at ( http://inter-iit.tech/ ). This domain [ 7 ] is given to the IIT hosting the competition. The website is maintained by organising team of host IIT. Apart from website, each year Host Institute also maintains the facebook page with regular updates.
